intro: Osteospermum ilicifolium, commonly known as the silverleaf osteospermum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is characterized by its silvery-gray leaves and daisy-like yellow flowers with purple centers. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers. It thrives in well-drained soil and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and borders. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its compact growth habit and long blooming period.
